items.name: Sanguine Phial
items.description: A small taste of the vital essence. Restores a bit of health.

items.name: Coca Root
items.description: A bitter root that energizes you as you chew it. Increases movement speed.

items.name: Medium Sanguine Phial
items.description: A satisfyingly large draught of the vital essence. Restores a sizeable amount of health.

items.name: Youth Tonic
items.description: Dealing damage while under the effects of the Youth Tonic will restore health.

items.name: Numbing Agent
items.description: Has a minor numbing effect on the mind. Gives hope.

items.name: Dungeon Likker
items.description: A sip of what ferments in the corners of the Necrovale. Provides hope when you kill an enemy.

items.name: Phlegmatic Phial
items.description: A small dose of phlegm. Increases your base attack speed for a time.

items.name: Melancholic Phial
items.description: A spot of black bile. Increases your base defense for a time.

items.name: Choleric Phial
items.description: A sip of yellow bile. Increases your base damage for a time.

items.name: Quicksilver Phial
items.description: A sip of shiny metal. Increases your base evasion for a time.

items.name: Cowards' Tonic
items.description: Drinking this temporarily provides a magical barrier.

items.name: Large Sanguine Phial
items.description: A gluttonous amount of the vital essence. Restores an excessive amount of health.

items.name: Scouring Agent
items.description: Destroys memories, including bad ones. Reduces despair.

items.name: Cyanide
items.description: Release yourself into nothingness, clearing all despair.

items.name: Angel's Wing
items.description: By biting into the Angel's Wing, your attacks will electrify, burn, and freeze enemies.

items.name: Petrified Foetus
items.description: The innocence of the foetus destroys all nearby enemies at high cost.

items.name: Preserved Eye
items.description: Increases the number of attacks you create, for a time.

items.name: Strange Brew
items.description: Keeps the donkey working.

items.name: Greed Tonic
items.description: Increases the amount of coins you get, but lowers your defense and evasion.

items.name: Ire Tonic
items.description: Returns any damage you recieve to all nearby enemies, but makes all your attacks inaccurate.

items.name: Arrogance Tonic
items.description: Increases your chance of dealing a critical hit, but potions have no effect while this is active.

items.name: Shame Tonic
items.description: Increases your defense and evasion, but you gain more despair.

items.name: Fear Tonic
items.description: Increases the damage you deal, but increases the damage you receive.

items.name: Sewerfruit
items.description: Provides a bit of health, but mostly despair.
items.flavor: Your body rejects this as food.

items.name: Acridfruit
items.description: Provides a dollop of health, but a lot of despair.
items.flavor: A fruit with no desire to be eaten.

items.name: Bitterfruit
items.description: Provides some health, and some despair.
items.flavor: It takes willpower to consume this.

items.name: Blandfruit
items.description: Provides a decent amount of health. Doesn't cause despair.
items.flavor: Merely fine. Hunger might help get it down.

items.name: Juicyfruit
items.description: Provides a good amount of health, and a little bit of hope as well.
items.flavor: An interesting and attractive flavor.

items.name: Hopefruit
items.description: Provides a swell of health and hope.
items.flavor: A beautiful and mysterious flavor, reminiscent of all good things.

items.name: --- MELEE ---
items.description: --- MELEE ---
items.flavor: --- MELEE ---

items.name: --- MELEE ---
items.description: --- MELEE ---
items.flavor: --- MELEE ---

items.name: --- MELEE ---
items.description: --- MELEE ---
items.flavor: --- MELEE ---

items.name: Rusted Blade
items.description: A worn down, rusted sword.
items.flavor: A pathetic weapon, but a weapon nonetheless.

items.name: Shillelagh
items.description: A hefty stick with a knot at the end.
items.flavor: Walk with a big stick, and you will go far.
items.power_description: Swipe the stick, stunning any nearby enemies.

items.name: Shortsword
items.description: A basic, close range weapon.
items.flavor: The shape of the blade was refined over many generations.
items.power_description: Perform a power stab, dealing massive damage.

items.name: Longsword
items.description: A weapon with long sweeping attacks.
items.flavor: Proper technique looks funny but is highly effective.

items.name: Dagger
items.description: Small close range weapon that attacks quickly.
items.flavor: Meant for rapid piercing of the kidneys and spleen.
items.power_description: Throw a fan of piercing daggers.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A long stick with a sharp bit on the end.
items.flavor: Keeps enemies, and fear, at bay.

items.name: Lochaber Axe
items.description: Swings out a path in front of you.
items.flavor: Doesn't cut well. Doesn't need to.

items.name: Stinger Spear
items.description: Attacks in quick succession.
items.flavor: The wafer thin blade allows penetration with little resistance.

items.name: Zaba Staff
items.description: A bladed staff that spins around you in a circle.
items.flavor: It twirls beautifully through the air as it kills.
items.power_description: Whip the staff in a wide arc.

items.name: Rustic Club
items.description: Slow attacks that breaks poise, stunning enemies in a large area.
items.flavor: A prehistoric implement, satisfying in its simplicity.
items.power_description: Plow a path ahead of you.

items.name: Spiked Knuckles
items.description: Execute a combo of painful punches on enemies.
items.flavor: Leave no debt unsettled.

items.name: Hock Chopper
items.description: A heavy blade that can quickly break an enemies poise, stunning them.
items.flavor: Meant for crippling horses in warfare.
items.power_description: Kills are likely to drop health.

items.name: Dancing Death
items.description: A curved blade that twirls effortlessly around you.
items.flavor: Reckless, cruel, vile, and beautiful.

items.name: Razorice Blade
items.description: Instantly freezes all enemies you hit.
items.flavor: Store it alongside sundries to preserve them.
items.power_description: Launch a barrage of ice shards.

items.name: Lava Chopper
items.description: Chop the ground and summon a meteor.
items.flavor: They might deflect the first blow. They won't deflect the second.
items.power_description: A cluster of meteors are summoned.

items.name: Shock Sticker
items.description: Electrify and break enemies poise, stunning them.
items.flavor: Plug 'em in and watch 'em dance.

items.name: Cretin's Poker
items.description: Hooked spear that pulls enemies closer.
items.flavor: Used by the tunnel-dwellers to snatch unsuspecting folk into their hidey-holes.
items.power_description: Do massive knockback in a line.

items.name: Maulers
items.description: Swipe at enemies with large bear claws.
items.flavor: Curiosity might kill a cat, but not a bear.

items.name: Sunblade
items.description: Hits have a chance at causing enemies to be Sunlit, negating their evasion.
items.flavor: What we are is revealed in the sun light.
items.power_description: Call down a barrage of sun beams.

items.name: Moonblade
items.description: Hits have a chance at causing enemies to be Moonlit, negating their defense.
items.flavor: But what we can be is shrouded in moon light.

items.name: Wind Sword
items.description: A thin curved blade that hastens the holder.
items.flavor: Will you follow the wind, or will the wind follow you?

items.name: Baylo Blade
items.description: A blade on the end of a chain that spins around you.
items.flavor: Like a spinning top of death.
items.power_description: A fan of blades grinds up any nearby enemies.

items.name: O' Haleighgong
items.description: Devestating knockback in a small area.
items.flavor: The Gong of house O' Haleigh. Said to send mens heads flying while the body stands still.
items.power_description: Devestating knockback in a large area.

items.name: Hooked Claw
items.description: A set of long hooked barbs that attach to the forearms, which pull enemies in.
items.flavor: Nothing is out of reach.
items.power_description: Enemies from all around are pulled in and sliced.

items.name: Executioner's Axe
items.description: There is a chance that you will Execute an enemy, dealing profound damage.
items.flavor: Why fear Death? If I am, Death is not. If Death is, I am not.
items.power_description: All your hits are guaranteed Executions.

items.name: Cleghorn's Block
items.description: Brings a heavy block down on unsuspecting fools.
items.flavor: Ol' Cleghorn had a penchant for gore. He was a good man, though.

items.name: Hammer of Wotana
items.description: Low damage, but builds power quickly.
items.flavor: Only the worthy...

items.name: Bloodletter
items.description: Extremely high chance for a critical hit, but damage yourself when you do.
items.flavor: Celebrating the special bond between enemies.

items.name: The Edge of Truth
items.description: Dispense the three aspects of truth.
items.flavor: Time will cut down all lies, leaving only the truth standing.

items.name: --- RANGE ---
items.description: --- RANGE ---
items.flavor: --- RANGE ---

items.name: --- RANGE ---
items.description: --- RANGE ---
items.flavor: --- RANGE ---

items.name: --- RANGE ---
items.description: --- RANGE ---
items.flavor: --- RANGE ---

items.name: Shortbow
items.description: Basic implement for launching arrows.
items.flavor: An aged piece of Yew with a lot of snap to it.

items.name: Longbow
items.description: Send out arrows with incredible force.
items.flavor: Thick oak haft requiring tremendous strength to draw.
items.power_description: Launch a powerful arrow that pierces all enemies.

items.name: Swift Bow
items.description: A bow capable of shooting at impressive speeds
items.flavor: The feeling of drawing tension on the bow is silky smooth.

items.name: Wanderer's Staff
items.description: Emits energy bolts that veer off course.
items.flavor: To wander is to move with the wind.
items.power_description: Release many bolts that seek their target.

items.name: Runic Staff
items.description: An old staff that can shoot energy bolts which pierce through enemies.
items.flavor: The gnarled piece of wood is covered with runes and radiating a strange energy.
items.power_description: The bolt will last a very long time and bounces.

items.name: Stardust Staff
items.description: Release a flurry of exploding stars.
items.flavor: The birth and death of a billion tiny galaxies, right before your eyes.
items.power_description: The stars last a long time, and bounce around.

items.name: Dart Gun
items.description: A small device that can rapidly shoot darts.
items.flavor: Far from fearsome, but useful in the right context.
items.power_description: Emit a wave of darts that stuns enemies.

items.name: Showman's Bow
items.description: Shoots out multiple arrows at once in an impressive display.
items.flavor: The design was perfected by a traveling grifter.
items.power_description: Create a dazzling fan of arrows.

items.name: Unruly Bow
items.description: Unleashes a wild burst of arrows.
items.flavor: Don't try to control it. Just unleash it.
items.power_description: The wild burst becomes utterly unmanageable.

items.name: Primordial Wand
items.description: Launches shards of ice that shatter and freeze enemies.
items.flavor: The Age of Ice is what shaped us.
items.power_description: The shards explode and freeze enemies.

items.name: Thunder Staff
items.description: Call down a bolt of lightning.
items.flavor: The air around it holds tension like the hours before a great storm.
items.power_description: The lightning chains to many targets.

items.name: Flame Column Staff
items.description: Summon a pillar of fire.
items.flavor: The cost of each pillar is beyond understanding.

items.name: Rain Bow
items.description: Shoot out an arrow with all status effects.
items.flavor: Suffering is what bonds us.
items.power_description: A barrage of arrows are guaranteed to cause all status effects.

items.name: Javelin
items.description: Hurls a large projectiles that punches through enemies.
items.flavor: Bearer of great inertia.

items.name: Chaff Launcher
items.description: Launches clusters of chaff.
items.flavor: Say farewell to your collarbones.
items.power_description: Launch a huge cluster of chaff.

items.name: Hotshot
items.description: Shoots out a barrage of arrows that ignite enemies.
items.flavor: The speed of the projectile sparks it as it leaves the bow.
items.power_description: Hitting an enemy drops a meteor on them

items.name: Wo Mur Ran
items.description: An oddly shaped piece of wood that returns to you.
items.flavor: Don't forget your warrior's wolf tail.
items.power_description: The Wo Mur Ran moves at incredible speeds and does more damage.

items.name: Obsidian Staff
items.description: A staff that creates balls of fire.
items.flavor: The obsidian remembers the lava.
items.power_description: Create three fireballs that explode on impact.

items.name: Arc Staff
items.description: Releases an electric bolt that arcs between targets.
items.flavor: All life is connected by death.

items.name: Crystal Staff
items.description: Form a pillar of ice.
items.flavor: To freeze is to return to what you once were.

items.name: Kalemonvo's Bane
items.description: Does more damage with higher hope.
items.flavor: To some, it can pierce the heavens. To others, it's nothing.

items.name: Mangrove Staff
items.description: Unleash a hurricane that sweeps away enemies.

items.name: Hand Cannon
items.description: Launch an explosive in the air.
items.flavor: Just don't get hoisted by your own petard.

items.name: Bomba Bow
items.description: A bow that shoots out explosive arrows.
items.flavor: Pure, dazzling spectacle.
items.power_description: The arrow pierces, causing an explosion with each hit.

items.name: Cobra Bow
items.description: Shoots out arrows that aren't satisfied by one target.
items.flavor: You can feel an evil hunger in the bow.
items.power_description: Shoot two additional arrows with massive range.

items.name: The Deadeye
items.description: Shoots long-range, piercing shots that do more damage to each successive target.
items.flavor: The tool of a professional killer.
items.power_description: The damage gain is massively increased, and the arrow seeks targets

items.name: Crusher Staff
items.description: Sends out a dense mass of energy that crushes anything it touches.
items.flavor: Look closely and you can see the entire universe swirling in its orb.
items.power_description: The Crusher last far longer, and pulls enemies into it.

items.name: Apocalypse Staff
items.description: Unleash a rain of meteors.
items.flavor: Do not fear the end / This world was meant / To be destroyed / And created again
items.power_description: Meteors shower down all around you

items.name: Flamejet Staff
items.description: A staff that releases dazzling jets of flame.
items.flavor: An oddity from the southern mire-shamans.
items.power_description: Send out a ring of flames.

items.name: --- OFHND ---
items.description: --- OFHND ---
items.flavor: --- OFHND ---

items.name: --- OFHND ---
items.description: --- OFHND ---
items.flavor: --- OFHND ---

items.name: --- OFHND ---
items.description: --- OFHND ---
items.flavor: --- OFHND ---

items.name: Heater Shield
items.description: Protects you from damage while held up.
items.flavor: The iconic tool of a man willing to risk his life for a cause.

items.name: Skipjack Totem
items.description: You roll faster.
items.flavor: I can not hide / Nor can I flee / For the skipjack fix'd his eye on me.

items.name: Bulwark Shield
items.description: Increases your poise, making you harder to stun, but slows poise recovery.

items.name: Death Whistle
items.description: Blow it to stun all nearby enemies.
items.flavor: To frighten enemies, or just relive a moment of viciousness.

items.name: Knave of Hearts
items.description: Throw out a ring of daggers.
items.flavor: It's a full house, and you aren't welcome.

items.name: Salto Crest
items.description: Decreases your roll cooldown.
items.flavor: Patron of the Jester / Friend to the Knave / Jokerman dance to the grave

items.name: Entropic Staff
items.description: Summon a blizzard, freezing all enemies in an area.
items.flavor: A beautiful creation, from those who worship the Entropic Gods.

items.name: Frostskin Staff
items.description: Cover yourself in a protective layer of ice.

items.name: Mountain Shield
items.description: Blocking an enemy stuns them.
items.flavor: The only thing that can defeat a mountain is time.

items.name: Wall of Suffering
items.description: When you block an enemy, they are hit with a Flame Column.
items.flavor: What do you get more of, the more you create?

items.name: Corpse Defiler
items.description: The nearest corpse explodes, causing damage to all nearby enemies.
items.flavor: The staff speeds up the natural decomposition process, turning the gastric contents into an explosive. The smell is intense.

items.name: Rohrer Crest Shield
items.description: While active, you are immune to despair.
items.flavor: The Rohrer men stand tall and proud, tracing their lineage back to The Father himself.

items.name: --- HLMET ---
items.description: --- HLMET ---
items.flavor: --- HLMET ---

items.name: --- HLMET ---
items.description: --- HLMET ---
items.flavor: --- HLMET ---

items.name: --- HLMET ---
items.description: --- HLMET ---
items.flavor: --- HLMET ---

items.name: Straw Hat
items.description: Provides a bit of health.
items.flavor: Mostly useless, and foolish looking to boot.

items.name: Skullcap
items.description: Occasionally evades an attack.
items.flavor: A ratty old scrap of leather. You can put it on your head if you want.

items.name: Dirty Bandana
items.description: Potions last a while longer.
items.flavor: A drunken fool at least knows how to drink.

items.name: Hunter's Cap
items.description: You can see farther.
items.flavor: One must eat the other, who runs free before him.

items.name: Ill-Fitting Cap
items.description: A poorly fitting helmet that lowers your accuracy.
items.flavor: The massive bowl covers your eyes.

items.name: Pigiron
items.description: Slightly reduces incoming damage.
items.flavor: A disintegrating iron helmet. Was likely meant to be decorative.

items.name: Crude Helmet
items.description: A crudely made helmet, by an inexperienced blacksmith.
items.flavor: Entrusting your life to a fool makes you a fool, too.

items.name: Juggernaut's Helm
items.description: Running into enemies knocks them back.
items.flavor: Move or I'll move you.

items.name: Oiled Hood
items.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
items.flavor: Oils keep the leather supple.

items.name: Beggar's Hood
items.description: More coins drop.
items.flavor: Need is the opposite of luck.

items.name: Tam o' Shanter
items.description: Your attacks have longer range.
items.flavor: A jaunty and colorful hat, proudly hand-knit from wool.

items.name: Floppy Coif
items.description: Potions last a lot longer, but aren't as effective.
items.flavor: Conceals your altered state.

items.name: Mage Hat
items.description: Adds a slight magical barrier around the wearer.
items.flavor: Imparts dignity and gravitas upon the wearer.

items.name: Focusing Circlet
items.description: Focuses the spread of your attacks.

items.name: Cathbarr
items.description: You take less damage.
items.flavor: Greater men than you have died wearing this.

items.name: Chapel Helm
items.description: Helps break an enemies poise faster, stunning them.
items.flavor: Wide visibility allows you to identify weaknesses.

items.name: Crusaders Helm
items.description: Defends against damage and despair.
items.flavor: A proud identifier of a righteous man.

items.name: Cult Symbol
items.description: When you attack, nearby enemies are stunned.
items.flavor: Obedience or death, the options of a true cult.

items.name: Mask of Shame
items.description: You deal more damage, but feel despair most acutely.
items.flavor: Shame can not hurt you when used as a weapon.

items.name: Chieftain's Headress
items.description: You deal more damage, but it's harder to stun enemies.
items.flavor: Authority is latent violence.

items.name: Crown of Elation
items.description: For each active potion, you deal more damage.
items.flavor: Elation never lasts.

items.name: Gossamer Hood
items.description: Provides a massive barrier, but reduces your health considerably.
items.flavor: We are tethered to life by the finest thread.

items.name: The Mollusk
items.description: Take less damage while standing still.
items.flavor: The Mollusk lingers, with its wandering eye.

items.name: Helm of Command
items.description: Your attacks are larger, and reach farther.
items.flavor: Sometimes a leader is nothing more than his hat.

items.name: Beautiful Armet
items.description: Excellent defense, but you are stunned more easily.
items.flavor: A true craftsman speaks through his work.

items.name: Thorn of Crowns
items.description: Whenever you're dealt damage, the life lost becomes a spirit that seeks the attacker.
items.flavor: Our misdeeds come back upon us. Sometimes rather quickly.

items.name: Balor Mask
items.description: Fire now spreads.
items.flavor: If the world should end in fire, this is how it will begin.

items.name: Rift Conduit
items.description: All nearby enemies are electrified, taking 50% more damage.
items.flavor: The air around you feels like it's about to snap.

items.name: Void Mask
items.description: Looking at enemies freezes them.
items.flavor: The mask hides your face, but reveals you.

items.name: Fertility Garland
items.description: Your armor, gloves, and boots are more effective.
items.flavor: Potency, life, renewal, death.

items.name: Crown of Storms
items.description: When you hit an electrified enemy, lightning strikes them.
items.flavor: A delicate filigree creation that rests upon your head like a nimbus cloud.

items.name: Hellfire Crown
items.description: When a flaming enemy dies, it explodes, damaging and igniting nearby enemies.
items.flavor: Curse or blessing, what is the difference anymore.

items.name: Whiteout Crown
items.description: Frozen enemies emit shards of ice, damaging nearby enemies.

items.name: Steeleye Circlet
items.description: When you land a critical hit, emit a barrage of daggers.
items.flavor: It takes a steel eye to see reality.

items.name: Deathseeker's Hood
items.description: Your attacks have a chance of Executing an enemy, dealing profound damage
items.flavor: More seek death than you would expect.

items.name: Crown of Arrogance
items.description: You constantly emit shards of ice that seek their target.
items.flavor: The heart of an arrogant man is never at ease.

items.name: --- ARMOR ---
items.description: --- ARMOR ---
items.flavor: --- ARMOR ---

items.name: --- ARMOR ---
items.description: --- ARMOR ---
items.flavor: --- ARMOR ---

items.name: --- ARMOR ---
items.description: --- ARMOR ---
items.flavor: --- ARMOR ---

items.name: Tattered Jerkin
items.description: Grants additional health.
items.flavor: You wont be winning any fashion shows. Then again, maybe you will.

items.name: Peasant's Blouse
items.description: Grants a small amount of evasion.
items.flavor: A peasant's lot is to survive.

items.name: Overtight Tunic
items.description: Provides evasion, but restricts attacks.
items.flavor: Better uncomfortable than dead.

items.name: Crude Plate
items.description: Provides some defense.
items.flavor: Crude, ill-fitting, and poorly crafted. It can stop a blow, however.

items.name: Heavy Iron Plate
items.description: Provides good defense, but slows you down.
items.flavor: It will get you there in one piece. Eventually.

items.name: Thrall's Plate
items.description: Good defense, but nothing else.
items.flavor: Befitting a man with little regard.

items.name: Thief's Tunic
items.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
items.flavor: Not noticed, not killed.

items.name: Storm-caller's Cloak
items.description: Your attacks electrify enemies, causing them to take more damage.
items.flavor: There is danger and education in living a reckless lifestyle.

items.name: Drunkards Shirt
items.description: Potion effects last longer, and potions drop more often.
items.flavor: Drinking is the art of avoiding life.

items.name: Coat of Plates
items.description: You take less damage.
items.flavor: A primitive protective garment, from a long conquered culture.

items.name: The Hodgepodge
items.description: Does a little bit of everything.
items.flavor: But nothing very well.

items.name: Fitted Chestplate
items.description: Defends you, and increases your poise, making it harder to be stunned.
items.flavor: The fit is unnervingly perfect...

items.name: Sharkskin Tunic
items.description: You do more damage when moving.
items.flavor: Stillness is for the dead.

items.name: Firebrand Cape
items.description: Flaming enemies do less damage to you.
items.flavor: A good magician never reveals their secrets. Sometimes they don't even know them.

items.name: Survivors Plate
items.description: You emit daggers.
items.flavor: Rumored to once be worn by a Vampire.

items.name: Illusory Cloak
items.description: You evade attacks while moving.
items.flavor: The perfect accessory for the man who would like to make a strong impression, then vanish.

items.name: Warding Robe
items.description: Projects a magical barrier around the wearer.
items.flavor: A silken garment, which imbues the wearer with a dangerous sense of safety.

items.name: Celebratory Tunic
items.description: You are healed whenever you evade an attack.
items.flavor: The good times are here again, rejoice.

items.name: Verglas Coat
items.description: When you take damage, emit frozen ice shards.
items.flavor: The proper response to an unfriendly greeting.

items.name: The Slubberdegullion
items.description: Enemies drop far more health globs.
items.flavor: Lick the bones clean.

items.name: Savage Coat
items.description: Killing an enemy heals you.
items.flavor: It's not that it hurts less, it's that you notice it less.

items.name: Chains of Ire
items.description: When you roll, you release a cluster of mortars.
items.flavor: Life is a battle, fought in inches.

items.name: Jazerant
items.description: You can not lose more than a percentage of your health from a single blow.
items.flavor: Death by a thousand cuts, maybe. Death by a single blow, never.

items.name: Tiarna's Mantle
items.description: When an enemy does damage to you, they are hit by lightning.
items.flavor: Things have a way of balancing out.

items.name: Reflective Shell
items.description: Evading an enemies projectile sends it back at them.
items.flavor: A carefree vindication of wrongdoings.

items.name: Monk's Robe
items.description: Easily evade attacks.
items.flavor: Walk without fear of lesser men.

items.name: Links of Carnage
items.description: A buzzsaw orbits around you, tearing into any enemy it touches.
items.flavor: The gore splatter is hard to avoid, however.

items.name: Ritter's Aegis
items.description: While attacking, your defense is massively increased.
items.flavor: Do not reject suffering, and do not accept it. Embrace it.

items.name: Hexsheild
items.description: The effect of any curses is massively reduced.
items.flavor: Sometimes avoiding bad luck is better than having good luck.

items.name: Battlepriest Raiment
items.description: Critical hits do more damage.
items.flavor: Good fortune is a blessing, from the machinery of the Universe.

items.name: Bloody Deerskin
items.description: You have no defense, evasion, or barrier. But you deal more damage.
items.flavor: Naked but for your instincts.

items.name: Coward's Cloak
items.description: Provides no health, but you become incredibly difficult to hit.
items.flavor: There is bravery in hiding away. But only a tiny bit.

items.name: Roarke's Kilt
items.description: You now dash with all of your attacks.
items.flavor: There's nothing here for a coward.

items.name: Bestia Loincloth
items.description: Your roll cooldown is massively reduced, but it no longer evades attacks.
items.flavor: Don it at your own risk.

items.name: --- GLVES ---
items.description: --- GLVES ---
items.flavor: --- GLVES ---

items.name: --- GLVES ---
items.description: --- GLVES ---
items.flavor: --- GLVES ---

items.name: --- GLVES ---
items.description: --- GLVES ---
items.flavor: --- GLVES ---

items.name: Leather Mittens
items.description: Allows for occasional evasion of attacks, but slows all projectiles.
items.flavor: They are ill-tailored to drawing a bowstring.

items.name: Dandy Gloves
items.description: Provide health, but little else.
items.flavor: I'd guess that the man who lost these didn't get too far.

items.name: Archer's Bracer
items.description: Provides no defense, but your projectiles may pierce enemies.
items.flavor: A true master is two steps ahead of his enemies, and one step behind himself.

items.name: Ornamental Gage
items.description: Slightly increases the effect of potions.
items.flavor: At the end of the day, Vermouth and Moonshine get you to the same place.

items.name: Iron Mittens
items.description: Provides great defense, but slows your attack speed.
items.flavor: The best defense is a good defense.

items.name: Heavy Bracers
items.description: Increases your poise damage, stunning enemies more easily.
items.flavor: It's about proper technique, not raw power.

items.name: Leather Gloves
items.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
items.flavor: Meant for work. Killing is work.

items.name: Slipshot Wristwrap
items.description: You attack faster and your projectiles move faster.
items.flavor: Better to be fast than good.

items.name: Ratfingers
items.description: You find much more gold.
items.flavor: It's amazing what you can find once you abandon dignity.

items.name: Flint-tip Mitts
items.description: Your attacks ignite enemies, causing them to take damage over time.
items.flavor: Put them away when you enter a wooden house.

items.name: Gauntlets of Despair
items.description: You deal more damage, but feel a creeping sense of dread at all times.
items.flavor: Nothing is free. Sometimes, you just can't see the cost right away.

items.name: Steel Handles
items.description: You take less damage.
items.flavor: Steel gloves to protect the hands and wrists.

items.name: Workadays
items.description: You deal more damage, but are unlikely to deliver a critical hit.
items.flavor: Work hard and don't expect much.

items.name: Silken Gloves
items.description: Adds a slight magical barrier around the wearer.

items.name: Monkey Hide Gloves
items.description: Your projectiles bounce off walls, increasing their damage.
items.flavor: Imparts the wild kinetic energy of a being whose life depends on it.

items.name: Stormeyes
items.description: Enemies are pulled into your melee attacks.

items.name: Heartseekers
items.description: Projectiles seek out enemies.
items.flavor: Each projectile is fused with the soul of an aggrieved fallen.

items.name: Heavy Strap
items.description: Your projectiles may now pierce through enemies.
items.flavor: The weak should fear the strong.

items.name: Demon Fingers
items.description: You attack faster and are more likely to deliver a critical hit.
items.flavor: Every sin has a price to be paid.

items.name: Scatterbangs
items.description: Your attacks become inaccurate, but deal slightly more damage.
items.flavor: They'll get to the point eventually.

items.name: Exploding Heart Technique
items.description: Enemies at low health spontaneously die.
items.flavor: A kick is not sufficient when they're down.

items.name: Golden Fingernail
items.description: Increases the number of attacks you create.
items.flavor: A delicate thing that shines beautifully in the low light.

items.name: Grenadier Gloves
items.description: All of your attacks explode.
items.flavor: Burn it all. Let The Father sort it out.

items.name: Avalanche Gloves
items.description: Successive hits with a single attack do more damage.
items.flavor: A single snowflake can destroy a village.

items.name: Manhandlers
items.description: When you hit an enemy, they are knocked back. If they hit a wall, they take extra damage.
items.flavor: Violence is the far end of diplomancy.

items.name: Shattertips
items.description: Frozen enemies have a chance to shatter when hit.
items.flavor: Beautiful to the right eye.

items.name: Viperfists
items.description: You attack faster.
items.flavor: The proof of the Viper is in the strike.

items.name: Singularities
items.description: Your attack count is set to one, but each additional attack adds damage and attack size.
items.flavor: All things began as one.

items.name: Ichorites
items.description: Steal health when you deal damage.
items.flavor: The ichor is an acquired taste.

items.name: Boilermakers
items.description: Each attack in a sequence does more damage.
items.flavor: It's not the first attempt that matters. It's the last.

items.name: Alchemist's Gloves
items.description: Potions are more effective, last longer, and you find more of them

items.name: Stormtouch Gauntlets
items.description: A lightning storm follows you.
items.flavor: Light travels faster than found. Death travels faster than light.

items.name: --- BOOTS ---
items.description: --- BOOTS ---
items.flavor: --- BOOTS ---

items.name: --- BOOTS ---
items.description: --- BOOTS ---
items.flavor: --- BOOTS ---

items.name: --- BOOTS ---
items.description: --- BOOTS ---
items.flavor: --- BOOTS ---

items.name: Messenger's Shoes
items.description: Provides no defense, but slightly increases movement speed.
items.flavor: The soles provide extra traction, allowing a quicker pace.

items.name: Cleats
items.description: Provides poise.
items.flavor: En garde!

items.name: Stylish Shoes
items.description: Provides slight evasion.
items.flavor: Would be impressive, if there were anyone to impress.

items.name: Spiked Boots
items.description: Offers no defense, but you do more damage
items.flavor: Spite will lead men to make strange choices.

items.name: Stompers
items.description: Great defense, but slows movement.
items.flavor: Don't expect to surprise anyone.

items.name: Sturdy Leathers
items.description: Solid defense and health.
items.flavor: They have carried many men through many campaigns.

items.name: Softshoes
items.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
items.flavor: Might as well dance a lick through the cell of your life.

items.name: Lickspittles
items.description: Taking damage gives you power.
items.flavor: Servile... until you aren't.

items.name: Greaves
items.description: You take less damage.
items.flavor: Sturdy boots with steel plate sewn on.

items.name: Dead-man's Boots
items.description: Your attacks freeze enemies, causing them to move and attack slower.
items.flavor: Wearing them makes the warmth of life feel distant.

items.name: Seasoned Boots
items.description: Good defense and evasion.
items.flavor: They have survived many battles, even if their owners may not.

items.name: Slickice Boots
items.description: You slide around.
items.flavor: There is no one to complain to when you fall.

items.name: Messenger of Death
items.description: Attacking no longer causes you to stop moving.
items.flavor: There is no negotiating with death, only outrunning it.

items.name: Mucklucks
items.description: Your attack range is less, but your damage is increased.
items.flavor: Only for those unafraid to confront the terrors of this world.

items.name: Slippers
items.description: Adds a slight magical barrier around the wearer.
items.flavor: Well-kept toenails are needed to keep from tearing the fine fabric.

items.name: Bullhooves
items.description: Generate power faster.
items.flavor: One victory often leads to another.

items.name: Firewalkers
items.description: You leave a trail of fire behind you.
items.flavor: Suffering is the path of wisdom.

items.name: Stonesouls
items.description: Your poise is massively increased, preventing stun.
items.flavor: Steady on.

items.name: Kingly Boots
items.description: Your attacks are larger.
items.flavor: A rightful king is courage personified.

items.name: Pattens
items.description: Your roll cooldown is reduced.
items.flavor: Dance while you can.

items.name: Soulsteppers
items.description: When you kill an enemy, you gain Hope but lose Health.
items.flavor: Take what you want, just be willing to pay the price.

items.name: Winklepickers
items.description: Your amulet effect is applied twice.
items.flavor: A silly shoe that has trod on the back of many poor fools.

items.name: Matador's Mandoletinas
items.description: Any evasion effect is amplified.
items.flavor: Bravery can never be taught, only learned.

items.name: Winged Sandals
items.description: You move swiftly.
items.flavor: Press on, with swiftness and grace.

items.name: Fleetfoot Boots
items.description: You run and attack significantly faster.
items.flavor: Wearing them almost feels like freedom.

items.name: Spatial Folds
items.description: You teleport to your target before attacking.
items.flavor: Ignore what you see while folding space. They are beings beyond consideration.

items.name: Redoublers
items.description: All your attacks are doubled.
items.flavor: Footwork is the foundation of combat.

items.name: Merchant's Shoes
items.description: You find items with a higher Refinement Level.
items.flavor: Never leave success up to chance.

items.name: --- AMLET ---
items.description: --- AMLET ---
items.flavor: --- AMLET ---

items.name: --- AMLET ---
items.description: --- AMLET ---
items.flavor: --- AMLET ---

items.name: --- AMLET ---
items.description: --- AMLET ---
items.flavor: --- AMLET ---

items.name: Deep Freeze Amulet
items.description: Freezing an enemy is more effective.
items.flavor: Cold is the cousin of death.

items.name: Wise Spirit
items.description: Potions are more effective.
items.flavor: The spirit of a woman with much accrued wisdom has found home in this locket.

items.name: Soothing Spirit
items.description: On completing a level, you gain health.
items.flavor: A fair and temperant judge lingers on, quenching the fires of extremity.

items.name: Tinkling Bell
items.description: Projectiles do much more poise damage, stunning enemies.
items.flavor: The sound of the bell will drive the wicked insane.

items.name: Ruddy Chain
items.description: Gives you more health.
items.flavor: Enriches and warms the blood. Reddens the cheeks.

items.name: Protective Spirit
items.description: Grants a magical barrier, and makes your barrier regenerate more quickly.
items.flavor: The spirit of a protective and nurturing Mother has found home in this trinket.

items.name: Seer's Amulet
items.description: Your attacks have much more range.
items.flavor: A smooth ancient stone, unchanged for a thousand generations.

items.name: Extinction Amulet
items.description: You are healed when dealing a critical hit.
items.flavor: More life has left this world than will ever be created again.

items.name: Splenetic Amulet
items.description: Gain power upon killing an enemy.
items.flavor: Ire comes from the spleen.

items.name: Hopeless Emblem
items.description: When you do damage, you heal yourself and gain despair.
items.flavor: Being witness to the endless cycle of suffering inspires in you a hopeless feeling.

items.name: Mark of the Tyrant
items.description: Enemies don't move when knocked back, and are stunned for longer.
items.flavor: Without conscience, the world is a magnificent toy.

items.name: Vengeful Amulet
items.description: You deal more damage, but you also take more damage.
items.flavor: Hatred is the only truly effective emotion.

items.name: Ghostly Pendant
items.description: Dodging counts as evading.

items.name: Contagious Laughter
items.description: Electrified enemies damage other nearby electrified enemies.
items.flavor: Once you get the joke of life, you will laugh to the grave.

items.name: BloodshotEye
items.description: Nearby enemies take more damage.
items.flavor: There is no room in this world for a blood stained eye.

items.name: Elemental Whirlwind
items.description: For every status effect on an enemy (burning, freezing, electrified), they take more damage.
items.flavor: A body is the story of what it has suffered.

items.name: Cobra Necklace
items.description: All of your projectiles seek an extra target.

items.name: Conductive Chain
items.description: When lightning strikes an electrified target, more follow.
items.flavor: Lightning never strikes twice. But sometimes it strikes three times.

items.name: Black Ice Charm
items.description: Frozen enemies turn into pillars of ice when they die.
items.flavor: An invisible danger that has claimed many unsuspecting lives.

items.name: Pyromaniac's Choker
items.description: Burning damage applies much more frequently.
items.flavor: I'm ready to close my mind and lose myself on the burning sands.

items.name: Third Eye
items.description: Increase the number of attacks you create.
items.flavor: The left eye sees the past. The right eye sees the future. The third eye sees the truth.

items.name: Mirrored Locket
items.description: When your projectile is destroyed, it forks.
items.flavor: A small locket with a pair of mirrors inside. The memories of what it has seen are passed back and forth for eternity.

items.name: The Tosspot
items.description: Potions are consumed immediately instead of being picked up. They are far more effective.
items.flavor: Strip away the dressings, and living is mere consumption.

items.name: Harlot's Amulet
items.description: You gain significantly more Hope.
items.flavor: It's a rare flower that can bloom in the dark.

items.name: Heart of Courage
items.description: Your health is massively reduced. Your damage is massively increased.
items.flavor: True courage is only revealed in the maw of reality.

items.name: Heart of Greed
items.description: Your health is massively reduced.
items.flavor: A greedy man has no taste for life, only the shadow of dreams.

items.name: --- BOOKS ---
items.description: --- BOOKS ---
items.flavor: --- BOOKS ---

items.name: --- BOOKS ---
items.description: --- BOOKS ---
items.flavor: --- BOOKS ---

items.name: --- BOOKS ---
items.description: --- BOOKS ---
items.flavor: --- BOOKS ---

items.name: Einkorn's Treatise
items.description: You are more likely to deliver a critical hit.
items.flavor: An easily debunked bit of propaganda.

items.name: Fiona's Diary
items.description: Adds a nice chunk of health.
items.flavor: The story of a life cut short.

items.name: The Joy of Life
items.description: Healing is more effective.
items.flavor: What can you touch but never hold?

items.name: Astrid's Lullaby
items.description: Gain Hope when starting a level.
items.flavor: A new life is all potential, and potential is hope.

items.name: Foraging Guide
items.description: Potions can drop at a higher Refinement Level.
items.flavor: Where to look, what to look for, and what to avoid.

items.name: The New Havamal
items.description: Reading its terse passages brings comfort, increasing Hope gain.
items.flavor: "Truth is a path / Deep into the woods / Of the unknown / That ends where it began."

items.name: The Prince of Thorns
items.description: You gain power at an increased rate.
items.flavor: A book with sinister ideas on power and politics.

items.name: Savage Dictolydium
items.description: Runes are more effective.
items.flavor: A compendium of brutal truths.

items.name: Deranged Sermon
items.description: Lightning now strikes in a larger area, and sets enemies on fire.
items.flavor: The rambling madness within becomes clarity and conviction with time.

items.name: Book of Seasons
items.description: Provides all elemental strikes.
items.flavor: The story of seasons precedes our own, and will continue on without us.

items.name: Book of Days
items.description: Provides Sunstrike and Moonstrike, potentially bypassing evasion and defense.
items.flavor: A day is the building block in the story of our lives.

items.name: Makar's Banned Verses
items.description: Fire is far more devestating.
items.flavor: Each word is a burning ember, illuminating a beauty and pain too great for this middling world.

items.name: Monsters Guide
items.description: Enemies start with reduced health.
items.flavor: A study of the essence of every enemy you might face in the Necrovale.

items.name: Brumal Edda
items.description: Ice attacks do more damage.
items.flavor: Fragment of a poem written of the icy end of the world.

items.name: Atumnal Edda
items.description: Fire attacks do more damage.
items.flavor: Fragment of a poem written about the fiery beginning of the world.

items.name: Vernal Edda
items.description: Electric attacks do more damage.
items.flavor: Fragment of a poem written about the golden age of men.

items.name: The Yadomejutsu
items.description: Your attacks reflect projectiles.
items.flavor: Turnabout is fair play.

items.name: Jereaux's Billfold
items.description: Picking up coins heals you.
items.flavor: Money wont save your soul, but it can save your life.

items.name: Crusader's Dirge
items.description: Killing enemies provides hope.
items.flavor: Mourn for them by continuing their righteous cause.

items.name: Blackthorn's Logbook
items.description: You sometimes get an extra level choice.
items.flavor: Blackthorn was one of the few to preserve his deep knowledge of the Necrovale.

items.name: Alchemical Codex
items.description: Potions drop much more frequently.
items.flavor: Alchemy is where knowledge and matter meet.

items.name: Desiderata
items.description: Blessings are far more effective.
items.flavor: With all its sham, drudgery, and broken dreams, it is still a beautiful world.

items.name: The Warrior Poet
items.description: Power moves themselves can generate power.
items.flavor: A coward fears violence, so a coward is never wise.

items.name: Book of Lost Souls
items.description: You deal far more damage, but become utterly Hopeless.
items.flavor: When you wander from the path, there are many strange things you can find.

items.name: Craftsman's Blueprints
items.description: Item drops are of a higher level.
items.flavor: Understanding your own tools is the key to using them effectively.

items.name: The Wheel of Life
items.description: You lose less hope on dying.
items.flavor: Suffering keeps the wheel of life turning.

items.name: Gambler's Dice
items.description: You take much more damage, but are more likely to evade attacks.
items.flavor: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

items.name: --- RUNES ---
items.description: --- RUNES ---
items.flavor: --- RUNES ---

items.name: --- RUNES ---
items.description: --- RUNES ---
items.flavor: --- RUNES ---

items.name: --- RUNES ---
items.description: --- RUNES ---
items.flavor: --- RUNES ---

items.name: Rune of the Lizard
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, burning does more damage.
items.flavor: The mark left by a hot iron.

items.name: Rune of the Wolf
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, freeze slows enemies more.
items.flavor: Drawn with blue ink under the skin.

items.name: Rune of the Hawk
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, electrified causes more damage.
items.flavor: Honoring those who have freed themselves from this world.

items.name: Rune of the Horse
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you move faster.
items.flavor: Relic of the forebearers, the men who tamed horses.

items.name: Rune of the Worm
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you steal a small amount of health from enemies.
items.flavor: Beneath notice, quietly rejuvenating the world.

items.name: Rune of the Boar
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you do more damage.
items.flavor: Giver and taker of life, full of masculine vitality.

items.name: Rune of the Snake
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you attack faster.
items.flavor: The most ancient foe of man. We have not forgotten his many forms.

items.name: Rune of the Sparrow
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you gain more Hope.
items.flavor: A hint of the freedom of a sparrow, in your pocket.

items.name: Potent Reagent
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, potions are more effective, but don't last as long.
items.flavor: A flame that burns twice as bright lasts one fifth as long.

items.name: Carved Crystal
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, blessings are more effective.
items.flavor: Man cannot create beauty. Only discover it.

items.name: Underwood's Curse
items.description: Your health constantly drains, but you steal health.
items.flavor: It just runs in their blood.

items.name: Rune of the Phoenix
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, you are resurrected upon death. However, this rune will be destroyed in the process.
items.flavor: Life is a dream you are perpetually waking from.

items.name: Wretch's Memento
items.description: While in your inventory, you lose fewer Coins upon dying.
items.flavor: To live is to let yourself fail.

items.name: Well Wishing Charm
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, increases the levels of items you find.
items.flavor: Wish, but never wish for too much.

items.name: Rune of the Ass
items.description: Gain a small amount of health upon completing a level.
items.flavor: If you're not good, you damn sure better be persistent.

items.name: Tessera
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, you are more mobile while blocking.
items.flavor: Our deeds are not judged, merely recorded.

items.name: --- CLCTB ---
items.description: --- CLCTB ---
items.flavor: --- CLCTB ---

items.name: --- CLCTB ---
items.description: --- CLCTB ---
items.flavor: --- CLCTB ---

items.name: --- CLCTB ---
items.description: --- CLCTB ---
items.flavor: --- CLCTB ---

items.name: Dull Ember
items.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 1 at the Forge.
items.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

items.name: Flickering Ember
items.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 2 at the Forge.
items.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

items.name: Shining Ember
items.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 3 at the Forge.
items.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

items.name: Radiant Ember
items.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 4 at the Forge.
items.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

items.name: Luminescent Ember
items.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 5 at the Forge.
items.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

items.name: Void Ember
items.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 6 at the Forge.

items.name: Treasure Map
items.description: Discovers a treasure chest.

items.name: Reagents
items.description: Strange liquid with unknown effects.

items.name: Tool Kit
items.description: A useful set of tools, that can be used to upgrade an item.

items.name: Tarot Card
items.description: A card with a disturbing image upon it.

items.name: Flower
items.description: A flower in full bloom. An exceedingly rare sight in the Necrovale.

items.name: God's Eye
items.description: The eye of a forgotten God, whose body was scattered.

items.name: Barbed Key
items.description: A strange key that pricks you when turned.

items.name: Skeletal Key
items.description: Human remains, fashioned into a macabre tool.

items.name: Bug Net
items.description: If you find this item, you found a bug. Please report what you were up to. Thanks! You can trade this to The Coward for a small reward.
items.flavor: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.

items.name: --- ENEMY ---
items.description: --- ENEMY ---
items.flavor: --- ENEMY ---

items.name: --- ENEMY ---
items.description: --- ENEMY ---
items.flavor: --- ENEMY ---

items.name: --- ENEMY ---
items.description: --- ENEMY ---
items.flavor: --- ENEMY ---

items.name: Gut Cutter
items.description: Barbed sword, designed to entangle with the intestines.
items.flavor: Do your guts hang low, can you tie them in a bow?

items.name: Belittler
items.flavor: Designed to tear at your spirit, making you feel small and foolish.

items.name: --- IDEAS ---
items.description: --- IDEAS ---
items.flavor: --- IDEAS ---

items.name: --- IDEAS ---
items.description: --- IDEAS ---
items.flavor: --- IDEAS ---

items.name: --- IDEAS ---
items.description: --- IDEAS ---
items.flavor: --- IDEAS ---

items.name: Empyrean Blade
items.description: Sends forth beautiful waves of light.
items.flavor: Reminiscent of a field of grain in autumn.

items.name: Firedancer's Lantern
items.description: Send out waves of fire around yourself.
items.flavor: Great for a performance too.

items.name: Butane Lung
items.description: Breath fire ahead.
items.flavor: Scarring of the lungs and windpipe common.

items.name: Necrocommand Staff
items.description: Reanimate a nearby enemy to fight for you.

items.name: Shepherd's Staff
items.description: Turn enemies into sheep.
items.flavor: Makes a great food source, if you don't think too hard about what you're eating.

items.name: Thorny Staff
items.description: Turn your own blood into projectiles.

items.name: Goo Blaster
items.description: Melts enemies with acidic slime.
items.flavor: "Maybe we can piece him back together!"

items.name: Deck of Cards
items.description: Throw playing cards at enemies. Aces do extra damage.
items.flavor: Death on the River.

items.name: Glass Cannon
items.description: Fire glass shards at enemies. Destroyed when you die.
items.flavor: "We're only gonna get one shot at this..."

items.name: Staff of Banishment
items.description: Open a portal which pulls nearby enemies into another dimension.

items.name: Staff of Divine Cleansing
items.description: Damage enemies in accordance with how sinful they were in life.
items.flavor: Let them look upon the face of their ancestors and falter.

items.name: Mark of Shame
items.description: Draws the gaze of an ancient evil.
items.flavor: -Everything is on fire. all other lights go out. powerful demon enemies spawn-

items.name: Electro Wave
items.description: Sends out electric sparks that crawl across the ground.

items.name: Cat's Eye Staff
items.description: Hurls fireballs up into the air.

items.name: Oak Feller
items.description: Holds a spinning blade in front of yourself.
items.flavor: Only meant for cutting trees. Do not use this for anything else.

items.name: Bladed Claw
items.description: A set of blades fashioned to a metal wrist-wrap.
items.flavor: Best not to get an itch while wearing them.

items.name: Beam Staff
items.description: A staff that releases an intense beam of energy.
items.flavor: One evil eye sits atop the staff, destroying all it beholds.

items.name: Keeley's Struggle
items.description: Hold your attack to empower your shot with bitterness.
items.flavor: Keeley learned that life is nothing but struggle, only resolved by death.

items.name: Ball and Chain
items.description: Tether yourself to a spiked ball.
items.flavor: There is a price to pay for the chains you refuse.

items.name: Irrational Abacus
items.description: All chain effects are doubled.

items.name: Weeping Shield
items.description: When you evade an attack, damage all nearby enemies.
items.flavor: Suffering frozen into steel.

items.name: Jellyfish
items.description: A large jellyfish follows you around adoringly.

items.name: Barrier Shield
items.description: Projects a protective barried in front of you.

items.name: Caltrops
items.description: Damages and slows enemies who talk through them.

items.name: Clatterbang
items.description: Activate to attract attention.

items.name: Hookshot
items.description: Shoot out a barbed hook to either move yourself along, or pull something towards you.

items.name: Electrostatic Web
items.description: Nearby enemies become stuck together.
items.flavor: What grows together, dies together.

items.name: Wind Spear
items.description: Does no damage, but knocks back enemies in front of you with the power of wind.
items.flavor: Tap into the secret currents in the sea of air.

items.name: Tomo's Bell
items.description: Ringing the Bell draws in all nearby Enemies.
items.flavor: It's said that the Ringing can only be heard by the wicked.

items.name: Hypnotic Panpipes
items.flavor: The melody never seems to begin, and never seems to end.

items.name: Targe
items.description: Evade oncoming attacks.
items.flavor: Often painted with the symbols of the ancient highland clans.

items.name: Repulsion Totem
items.description: All nearby enemies are pushed away.
items.flavor: A familiar feeling to you.

items.name: Singularity
items.description: Create a singularity, drawing in all enemies.
items.flavor: Atomic intimacy.

items.name: Boar's Shield
items.description: Defends while active, and charges when dropped.
items.flavor: The symbol of the Boar strengthens the resolve of men charging to their death.

items.name: Mirror Shield
items.description: Reflects projectiles back at their source.
items.flavor: When you attack someone, the last thing you want to see is your own reflection.

items.name: Teleporation Staff
items.description: Teleports you to the desired location.

items.name: Time Turner
items.description: Activate to slow down time.
items.flavor: Do not stretch time too thin. Those who wait between are watching.

items.name: Goat Horns
items.flavor: Bring them to the Bacchanalia.

items.name: Scarecrow Hat
items.description: Standing still disguises you from enemies.
items.flavor: Don't stand for too long... one can lose themselves in being nothing.

items.name: Spirit Bear's Hide
items.description: You may equip a weapon in your offhand.
items.flavor: The preserved hide of a great beast, long gone from this world.

items.description: When you evade an attack, you move faster.

items.name: Clumsy Heavy Boots
items.description: When you bump into an enemy, you damage them.
items.flavor: "I'm just gonna squeeze by ya." - Last thing heard before expiration

items.name: Moonshoes
items.description: Your melee attacks become jumping attacks.
items.flavor: Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which ne never shows to anybody.

items.name: Frostbite Amulet
items.description: Frozen enemies die with an explosion of freezing shards.

items.name: Demonfire Pendant
items.flavor: The cost of use is enormous.

items.name: Penitent Psalm
items.flavor: Truth begins with humility. Contentment begins with truth.

items.name: The Book of The Father
items.description: Your attacks have more range.
items.flavor: A beautiful oral tradition of warriors, made vulgar by its translation.

items.name: Puzzle Cube
items.description: All item drops are higher level.
items.flavor: The value is not in completing it, but in trying.

items.name: Cynic's Manifesto
items.description: Despair consumes you.
items.flavor: Truth can be taken too far.

items.name: Ghostly Mantle
items.description: When you attack with a melee weapon, ghostly copies of yourself join in on the fun.
items.flavor: When you wear the mantle, you can feel your ego dissolving.

items.name: Rune of the Dog
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, you gain a small amount of health.
items.flavor: A wolf brought low by man.

items.name: Rune of the Cat
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, you gain power faster.
items.flavor: Still in possession of its predatory instincts.

items.name: Rune of the Slug
items.description: While sitting in your inventory, potions are more effective.
items.flavor: Lowly but vital.

items.name: Rune of the Beetle
items.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you take less damage.
items.flavor: Industrious and prolific.

items.name: Turpentine
items.description: Massively reduces damage taken for a short while.

items.name: Beefsteak
items.description: Your attacks will send enemies flying, for a time.

items.name: Flask of Mead
items.description: Gets you drunk.
